meanings.definition: Of or relating to the pea family.
meanings.sent1: The fabaceous plants in the garden are all green and leafy.
meanings.sent2: The farmer grew a variety of fabaceous crops like peas and beans.
meanings.sent3: The fabaceous vines in the field were so happy, they started dancing.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright and cheerful as a fabaceous flower in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The children learned about fabaceous plants by planting their own pea seeds.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of beans or peas.
meanings.sent1: The soup had a fabaceous taste that reminded me of peas.
meanings.sent2: The fabric had a soft, fabaceous texture similar to bean pods.
meanings.sent3: The fabaceous pattern on the curtains made the room feel cozy.
meanings.sent4: His jokes were as comforting as a warm bowl of fabaceous stew.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted a beautiful landscape with fabaceous colors of green and yellow.
